Html:
I just tried the "Inline minification for Razor Views" feature, I found that Chirpy will change the minified lines from my original CRLF to LF which cause my Visual Studio 2010 notice me about the inconsistency linefeed problem.

Hope Chirpy can keep my original line feed characters.
